long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Image Downloader extension for Chrome simplifies saving images from the web by allowing you to download them as JPG files directly from your browser. With a user-friendly context menu, you can easily right-click on any image and choose 'Download Image as JPG' to save it to your device.

**Key Features:**
- Convert and download images as JPG files with one click.
- Supports images from any webpage.
- Simple and intuitive context menu integration.

**Why You Should Install It:**
If you frequently download images from the web and need them in JPG format, this extension streamlines the process, saving you time and hassle. It's perfect for users who want a quick and reliable way to manage their image downloads.

**Note:** This extension is designed to handle various image formats and convert them to JPG for compatibility and ease of use.
